bibl.title: Eracle, gli Arcadi e Platone comico (ancora su P. Oxy. 2737).
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XXXV, 2737 (= M.-P.3 157.1; LDAB 345), fr. 1, col. 2, 10-17. - À propos de: Andrew Hartwig, The Date of the Rhabdouchoi and the Early Career of Plato Comicus, ZPE 174 (2010) pp. 19-31.
